title: kaNDu koNDEn
sahitya:
kaNDu koNDEn sakhiyE kaDavuLaik-


anupallavi

  aNDattilum uyirp-piNDattilum anbar aghattinilum mAdar mukhattinilum tEDik-


caraNam 1    kUzhaik-kuDittavan Ezhaik-kuDililE kuzhandaiyAi tavazhndAnaDi
kutUhala mAyavan podu nalat-toNDarin kUTTALi AnAnaDi
    caraNam 2    AzkaDalilE Ani muttaip-pOlE amaidiyin mOnattilE vAzhu nAyakan 
Alu nAyakan engum shUzhum nAyakan shuddhAnanda sahAyan avanaik-
